name: Jasmyne “FatGirlish” bay
text:
I’m so excited this place is open. I’ve seen it on SM with great feedback. I came for lunch and the drive thru was packed. Looks to only one ordering system.
I walked in , entrance is right in front of the cashier and restrooms. I was greeted with someone handing me a take out menu. I began my order by letting them know I had a free sandwich from the app. Yikes things got a little crazy. No one knew how to probably add my coupon code. The coupon code is timed after you hit redeem so it actually disappeared. But no worries the time got me set with my cayenne ranch chicken sandwich meal. Jared was very nice taking my order and my food came out quick! The sandwich was amazing. Very light spice. The Buffalo wings are really goodThe fries was seasoned pretty while too! I really enjoyed this place great new option on skyland.

name: Rodi Vienni
text:
Friendly staff.
Delicious food.
The soda wasn't so well,  just water and sugar.
But still 5 start

name: M S
text:
I had been waiting for this location to open for a while as this is one of my favorite fast food chicken places to eat and it didn’t disappoint.

Since this was opening day, hiccups were expected, but overall the restaurant was running smoothly.  The staff are very friendly and the old came out quickly.  The food was delicious and staff members came by multiple times to check on us.  Highly recommend slim chickens for their great chicken as well as an abundance of sauces and sides. Will be back soon.

name: Jason Kimbrell
text: Best wings ever!  Love the potato salad too!  Would definitely recommend the garlic Parmesan and the cayenne ranch sauces!

name: Denise Drain
text:
Over the top fast casual dining!  They have the best chicken & homemade sauces that are second to none!  & great desserts....  our son love the waffle/chicken.  YUM!
Friendly staff, keep it up!!!  ❤️my fam's new fav place!!

name: Greg Mashburn
text:
Staff was awesome, very attentive and on their game
Chicken was top notch and sauces were something great for every taste.  Desserts were over the top. I’m going back

name: Abdulaziz Alharbi
text: I had the crispy chicken sandwich and it tasted so bad that it made me throw up. Like it tasted really weird. I’m pretty sure they cook all the chicken in the same pan. I also got the slim sauce and it tasted really weird too… My advice, if you’re going to pay for something like that, go across the street and get Chic-fil-a. This is my first time eating here and definitely my last. 👎🏻🤮🤢

name: Jalyn Whitt
text: I do not like this restaurant and do not see why the line be so long and why they have all the hype my fries where cold and my chicken tenders was just awful and my sweet tea wasn’t even sweet and they employees are lazy and don’t wanna do nothing but talk if I was the manger they all would be fired and when you put in an application they say they gonna call back and don’t then they did not got my order right this HAS TO BE THE WORST RESTAURANT do NOT GO HERE I REPEAT DONT GO HERE.

name: Brooklyn Robinson
text: Do not get the tenders !!! Very soggy ! Fries were overly salted and hard . I asked for peach tea and got a flat coke. Customer service was mediocre.

name: Katina Sewell
text: The meal was disgusting. I got the buffalo wings and fries and it was so bland no seasoning at all. Not worth the money.

name: Alan Reeves
text: Good food, wide variety of sauces, great tea flavors. Employees were super nice and the service was quick

name: Rex Cheatham
text: Had the 3 & 3 meal and the tenders, wings and fries were excellent. Would highly recommend.

name: Pierre Hutchins
text: Buffalo wings tasted bland this time and milk shake was the smallest around town for $4 and the cup wasn't even full

name: Ashllie Ramirez
text: Professional caring customer service, Haley made sure I selected the best building to fit my needs. Delivery was quick and easy. The delivery men were very kind and sure to level the building and place it where I wanted. They have such a wide variety to choose from to fit everyone's needs. I was able to customize my building to my liking. Haley was honest and took time to look around with me. I spent nearly 4 hours here trying to make a decision on all their selection. Would recommend to anyone in search of a good quality building and great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you so very much Ashllie!! I do my best to make sure every customer will love their building!! Hope you’re doing well!

name: Becca A. Ali
text: Gorgeous buildings and very good prices, hailey is the absolute best ! 5 stars !!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business and review!! We are so happy you love your buildings!

name: Kristen Smith
text: If you ever get behind in a payment due to an illness or whatever the reason they will make payment arrangements with you to catch it up then after you’ve paid them still come get your building. 10/10 do not recommend if you are looking for someone to trust and honesty  is important to you.

resp.text:
I am very sorry to hear this! Unfortunately, I can't control the financing company policies. I do know that you have so many days after a payment is due to make it up, most of our companies do let you get a few months behind before repossessing the item.
I hate that you are displeased with our business, but there isn't anything I can do about the financing companies, but I do not believe we have ever repossessed anything that was paid for!!
